name: 沈耀明
objective: 1.資料表示法：定點系統(Fixed Point System)，浮點系統(Floating Point System)，2.運算工作：定點之加減乘除，快速之運算，浮點運算，3.指令與控制：各種指令介紹，中斷，硬體控制單元設計(Hardwired Control)，微程式控制單元設計(Microprogramming)，4.記憶系統：記憶體之層次(Memory Hierarchy)，虛擬記憶系統(Virtualmemory)，快速記憶(Cache Memory)。
schedule:
週次	內容	                                                                作業
1	課程介紹	
2	Review Ch1~Ch6	
3	Ch7. Input/Output and Storage Systems 1	
4	Ch7. Input/Output and Storage Systems 2	
5	Ch8. System Software 1	
6	Ch8. System Software 2	
7	Ch9. Alternative Architectures 1	
8	Ch9. Alternative Architectures 2	
9	Mid-term test 期中考	                                             HW1(ch7,8,9)
10	Ch10. Topics in Embedded Systems 1	
11	Ch10. Topics in Embedded Systems 2	
12	Ch11. Performance Measurement and Analysis 1	
13	Ch11. Performance Measurement and Analysis 2	
14	Ch12. Network Organization and Architecture 1	       HW2(ch10,11)
15	Ch12. Network Organization and Architecture 2	
16	Ch13. Selected Storage Systems and Interfaces 1	
17	Ch13. Selected Storage Systems and Interfaces 2	
18	Final Test 期末考	                                            HW3(ch12,13)
scorePolicy:
1.	期中考佔35%
2.	期末考佔40%
3.	作業佔15%
4.	出席情況佔10%, 缺席一次扣1%, 遲到或早退各扣0.5%.
materials:

書名: The Essentials of Computer Organization and Architecture 2/e
作者: Linda Null and Julia Lobur
